message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a competitive price of $120. I believe it's a great value and will serve you well. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm not comfortable going above $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand your position, but $90 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $105? This price reflects the true value of the item.
I understand your position, but $105 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
